attributes.action: A General Election to give the people a Government for leaving the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
No political party has openly, transparently discussed leaving the EU.   Our last General Election did not discuss the details of not being in the EU and the Remain/Leave campaigns was a battle ground.  

We need a Government with strong Leadership that is newly elected to take the Uk into history.
attributes.background: Following the EU Referendum the people need a Government that can take us confidently through this unchartered territory. There are police investigations into corruption at the last General Election, the Prime Minister is standing down the public have a right to determine who takes the UK forward.
